reviewText:
Guess I didn't read the information correctly??  But this DVD does not play on our DVD player.  Must be for the United Kingdom systems??
Only my oldest grandson remembers this series...I wanted the other grandkids to know this series also.  It is so cute.

Good service, poor product. I was sent this DVD and it would not work in any ofy devices. Upon contacting the company they were polite and offered to send me a replacement. Unfortunately the second DVD would not work either. This was very frustrating for me and disappointing for my toddler.
Couldn't play it it is a movie for section 2 region only cannot use on American DVD players
DVD will not pay in our DVD - no mention that it was not compatible for our region DVD players

Imagine mine and my 3 year old's surprise when the DVD wouldn't play in our DVD player because its the wrong region. It would have been nice to have this information BEFORE I spent $10 and waited almost two weeks for it to arrive. Am I the only one who didn't know DVD players are different in England?!

Received product timely; however, my son was extremely disappointed that it didn't work since it is not compatible with US DVD players (it is set-up for Region 3; US is Region 1). There is no mention of this on description of the product.
